name: website-schedler-co
description: Curriculum vitae (CV) | Alexander Schedler: Internet application engineering, development and management. Javascript (Frontend and Backend), HTML, CSS, Node, CouchDB

scripts.build: npm run clean:build; npm run build:rev -- ./src/version.json; npm run build:pages; parcel build src/index.html
scripts.surge: npm run build; cp dist/index.html dist/200.html; surge --domain schedler-co-7.surge.sh dist/
